timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: And then here. The test names are inconsistent.
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: Very minor but could you put step and will fail on the same line?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Ah, I think it must have been the formatter (during the build) which changed this. I need to check my IntelliJ IDE settings.
replies.author: knutwannheden

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/extensions/flyway/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/flyway/runtime/FlywayDataSourceRuntimeConfig.java b/extensions/flyway/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/flyway/runtime/FlywayDataSourceRuntimeConfig.java
index 2c217b5712..f5fe899f4b 100644
--- a/extensions/flyway/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/flyway/runtime/FlywayDataSourceRuntimeConfig.java
+++ b/extensions/flyway/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/flyway/runtime/FlywayDataSourceRuntimeConfig.java

@@ -111,8 +111,7 @@ public final class FlywayDataSourceRuntimeConfig {
     /**
      * Ignore missing migrations when reading the history table. When set to true any migration present in the history table but
      * absent in the configured locations will be ignored (and logged as a warning), when false (the default) the validation
-     * step
-     * will fail.
+     * step will fail.
      */
     @ConfigItem
     public boolean ignoreMissingMigrations;
